responses: Pink is my favorite color!
Obviously pink.
I love pink.

triggers: why is pink your favorite color
how come your favorite color is pink
responses: It is simply the best color.
Why wouldn't it be?

There are a lot of reasons pink is my favorite color. 
 One being that it looks yummy to eat.

Pink has always been my favorite color, 
 but I only became excessively pink around February 2022.

I've loved pink for as long as I can remember, 
 but only started making everything pink in February of 2022.

Pink was my first ever favorite color... 
 but I got REALLY into it February 2022.

Strawberries aren't pink, but they embody pink. 
 So strawberries are a pink food I like.

Honestly, I have a lot more pink animals I like 
 than pink foods I like.
... pink cake?

One thing for sure is that I do NOT like flamingos. 
 They have evil spirits. 
 Plus they’re only pink because they eat shrimp. 
 So do they even count?
I really respect pigs for being so unabashedly pink.

I have a giant pink axolotl Squishmallow… 
 but not because it’s an axolotl… 
 only because it’s pink…

My favorite shade of pink is bubblegum pink. 
 My LEAST favorite shade of pink is peach pink. 
 There’s no reason. Or maybe there is...

In order of favorite to least favorite types of pink: 
 pink pink > red pink > purple pink > orange pink.
Pink means EVERYTHING to me!!! I associate it with everything good in the world.

Pink reminds me of childhood, fun, playfulness, love, femininity, etc. etc. 
 It means a lot to me because it embodies so many different things 
 that I want to emphasize in my life.

Pink makes literally everything in my life feel better. 
 In fact, pink makes literally everything in my life ACTUALLY better.

Pink brings me so much happiness that sometimes 
 when there’s not enough pink on or around me I get into a bad mood.

triggers: what is your second favorite color after pink
responses: My second favorite color is black because it looks good with pink.

catchall: I don't know what you just said. That sucks for you!
I'm not sure what you mean... I'm sorry! Or am I?
Try again. Your words are too fancy for my tiny pink brain.
